description:
Modify godoc so that clicking on an identifier
goes to its definition. Depends on the following
updates:
	http://codereview.appspot.com/186094 (correct html quoting)
	http://codereview.appspot.com/181168 (scopes in ast)
	http://codereview.appspot.com/186097 (go/lookup package)

messages.text:
Hello gri (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change.

subject: code review 184084: Modify godoc so that clicking on an identifier
